Name: Cowboy
About the game: This is a third person role-playing game，Players have swords, bows and arrows, and guns（You need to be on a horse to use it）,Players are free to explore the surrounding area,Players must maintain health，Players can kill nearby monsters or dodge attacks from monsters. Control keys: Right-click targeting WASD movement Left mouse button attack Mouse control direction R Loaded Weapons Number keys 1,2,3 switch horse speed Numeric keys 4,5,6 switch weapons（It only works when you're on a horse）
